page.title: 05LITTLEBURY GREEN
page.content: {Littlebury Green}is a very small and quiet{hamlet}situated near Saffron Walden in Essex.It has a small population of 96 people.There are about 70 buildings with some empty and there is one church and a public playing field. The{church}in Littlebury Green is small and is made out of green corrugated iron sheets.It has many purposes such as keep-fit,women's institute,toddlers group,youth club, jumble sales,fund raising and the most obvious of all,a place of worship. It was built in 1884 and was finished and opened in 1885.The reason it was made out of corrugated iron sheets is because it was the cheapest material around. Housing in the hamlet is well spaced and most of the houses are modern.{ Littlebury Green is a linear village.
